name: EMI GGUS  Monitor
body:
### EMI GGUS Monitor

The [EMI](http://www.eu-emi.eu/) project provides a software platform for high performance distributed computing
which forms the core of grid middleware distributions used by scientific research communities and distributed computing infrastructures all over the world.

The EMI GGUS support monitor is a python script that provides insight on the status and performance
of EMI support units leveraging the [GGUS] (https://ggus.eu/pages/home.php) ticketing system web services.

### Dependencies

* python >= 2.6
* python-suds >= 0.3.9

### Installation instructions

To install this package on your machine, please type (as root):

~~~
# python setup.py install
~~~

### Usage

~~~
$ ggus.py
~~~

will generate the support status report, be patient.

~~~
$ ggus.py --help
~~~

provides insights about other options.

### Support or Contact

Having troubles? Open an issue [here](https://github.com/andreaceccanti/emi-ggus-mon/issues).
tagline: A simple, python-based monitoring tool to track the EMI project support performance.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
